abstract: Jeni's Splendid Ice Creams of Ohio becomes second major ice cream producer to shut down production amid concerns about listeria contamination; recalls all of its frozen products, following similar move by Blue Bell Creameries.
lead_paragraph: Jeni’s Splendid Ice Creams of Ohio said on its website that it had recalled all its frozen products.

headline.main: Another Ice Cream Company Issues a Recall of Its Products
headline.print_headline: Another Ice Cream Company Issues a Recall of Its Products

snippet: Jeni’s Splendid Ice Creams of Ohio said on its website that it had recalled all its frozen products.
